content: this text is a summary of a legal case involving a court appeal related to a data issue the appellant filed an appeal challenging a decision made by a lower court in favor of the respondent the appellant argued that the lower court made errors in its decision and requested the higher court to review the case the higher court reviewed the arguments and evidence presented by both parties and made a decision on the appeal the court either upheld the decision of the lower court or overturned it the courts decision on the appeal is final and cannot be further challenged the text also mentions the details of the case such as the disputed property being a twobedroom apartment owned by former spouses and the division of the property being determined as 70 for the plaintiff and 30 for the defendant the court ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff a sum of money within a specified time frame the text also discusses the legal arguments made by both parties and the courts analysis of the evidence the court dismissed the defendants appeal and upheld the judgment of the lower court the text concludes by mentioning the costs of the proceedings that the defendant is responsible for paying

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani I Cp 1732/2021, 12. 1. 2022
